**Verdict: Approved**

I've completed a thorough review of this PR which adds the web dashboard foundation (Next.js 16, Tailwind v4, Discord OAuth2).

### Review Checklist
- [x] Code Quality (ESM, TypeScript, error handling)
- [x] Architecture & Patterns (server-only separation, proper state management)
- [x] Security (tokens server-side, NEXTAUTH_SECRET validation, security headers)
- [x] Testing (80%+ coverage threshold configured and passing)
- [x] Docker & Deployment (multi-stage build, healthcheck, monorepo support)
- [x] Discord-specific (rate limiting, pagination, graceful degradation)

2. `web/src/components/layout/server-selector.tsx:55` - Consider validating JSON shape before casting

Both are minor polish suggestions that don't block approval. The implementation is solid and CI is passing.
